  Item 9.01.  Financial Statements and Exhibits  
                                                 
Exhibits are filed herewith
in connection with the Registration Statement on
Form S-3 (File Nos. 333-270532 and 333-270532-01)
filed by Wells Fargo &
Company and Wells Fargo Finance LLC with the
Securities and Exchange Commission.

On April 27, 2023, Wells Fargo & Company
updated its Medium-Term Note Program, Series T, and
Wells Fargo Finance LLC updated its Medium-Term
Note Program, Series A. The purpose
of this Current Report is to file with the
Securities and Exchange Commission the related
Distribution Agreements and forms of notes approved
for each series.
